name: Space Control (itch) (bpremus)
description:
#Zero Hour Game Jam 2021, a game made in 1 hour

How to play: 

Drag a path with a mouse from a spaceship to a planet with same color that orbits the sun

Assets combined from multiple of my projects (mostly from The Split)  

  • Background image is from google images, and single sound effect 
  • Shader and path are from "the Split",  
  • Elipse and trail are line and trail renderer with my shader from prototype projects  
  • Spawn mechanism is from "Human sux"
  • 1 Blender model, and planets are unity spheres 

I wanted to add also gravity that is messing with the path but could not finish in time

31.10.2021 - Uploaded full screen desktop version
